column1: Samurai: Game of Politics and Warfare in Feudal Japan
Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Movement Points, Ratio / Combat Results Table, Simulation, Turn Order: Progressive

(from the back of the box:)<br/><br/>You are now back in time-12th through 17th century Japan, to be exact. Your objective: the exalted title of "Shogun". As "Shogun", you will have the right to enforce the emperor's will, and become the real ruler of Japan.<br/><br/>Samurai allows you to take control of Japan. In medieval Japan, the central government of the emperor was dissolved. He become a powerless figurehead while various clans competed to take control ...
Components: Map (Continental / National scale), Country: Japan, History: Kamakura Period to Muromachi Period, History: Sengoku Period
Samurai: A Battleline Game of Politics and Warfare in Feudal Japan, Samurai: Game of Politics and Warfare in Feudal Japan - 12th thru 17th Centuries
